price: 16. En wanneer jullie beiden tot de Farao komen zeg: “Wij zijn de Boodschappers van de Heer van de werelden.
arabic: فَأۡتِيَا فِرۡعَوۡنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fatiyā fir'ʿawna faqūlā innā rasūlu rabbi al-ʿālamīna
